resources.string: Kuul is an one stop service for women who are suffering from domestic violence

Please give real information so that we can identify
 You in case anything happens and you are in danger.
 
 Please note that Phone Number cannot be changed.
Alternatively, if you have suffered from \n domestic abuse in the past,you can report \n those incidents will be reported too directly from this app

Eveneer is an IT Firm focused on developing real life 
 solutions to real life problems. We are a small team of 
 creatives, who got together and thought that if you 
 could change the world by making things which 
 could help the society.

 This product was made for Banglalink's SDG
 Hackathon but it doesn't mean we will not try
 to implement it in real life.

 Thank you for viewing this prototype
